visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type: line, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#346691) for the plot border and set the font size of the x-axis labels to 12px, Data series: Provide a single series named 'Temperature' with monthly average temperature data, Custom colors: Use a specific color palette for the series data points, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color (#f0f0f0) and include a legend at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart displaying monthly average temperatures. The chart type is set to 'line', and the title is 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px, and the plot border is colored in a dark blue (#346691) with a width of 2 pixels. The chart background is set to a light gray (#f0f0f0) for better contrast. The data series includes a single series named 'Temperature' with monthly temperature data points, each colored in a specific shade of blue (#0073e6). Additionally, a legend is included at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
